text: Abraham Kithure Kindiki (born 17 July 1972) is a Kenyan politician, lawyer and a former law professor who is the 3rd and current deputy President of Kenya since 1 November 2024. He was the Cabinet Secretary for Interior and National Administration from 2022 to 2024. He was the Senator for Tharaka-Nithi County from 2013 to 2022. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Kenya Category:Kenyan lawyers Category:Academics
title: Kithure Kindiki
